page.title: 14A Typical Family Day
page.content: On a Thursday, on an ordinary working day, each member of the Thomas family does a different thing. At about 7 a.m. we start getting up. Then we take it in turns to use the bathroom and get dressed. At about 7.30 a.m., we all go downstairs to have breakfast. Mum prepares the breakfast for us. Dad is usually the first to finish and at 7.45 a.m. he goes to work for British Telecom in Wolverhampton. Then at 8.15 a.m., Mum, Neil and I walk down to school. Mum goes on to work at the Post Office. At 4 p.m., Neil and I reach the Post Office, after leaving school and at 4.30 p.m. we go shopping. Dad picks the family up at 5 p.m. and we all have tea together as soon as we get home. At 5.45 p.m., we visit Nan and stay for about an hour then I go to Guides. At 9 p.m. I return home.
